TASHKENT About Weather
Tashkent is the capital and largest city of Uzbekistan. The city has a population of 2.5 million people and is the most populous city in Central Asia.
Tashkent has a dry continental climate. Summers are hot and dry, with temperatures reaching up to 40C (104F) in July and August.

FERGHANA
FERGHANA About Weather
Ferghana is a city in the Ferghana Valley of eastern Uzbekistan. It is the administrative center of the Ferghana Region. The city lies along the Syr Darya river.
Ferghana has an arid continental climate with hot summers and cold winters. The avarage temperature in summer is between 25-35 C and in winter -7-2 C.

TERMEZ
TERMEZ About Weather
Termez is a city in the south of Uzbekistan, located on the banks of AmuDarya river. It is the capital of Surxondaryo Province and has population of approximately 150.000 people.
Termez has a desert climate. Summers are hot and dry, with temperatures reaching up to 40C (104F). Winters are mild and dry, with temperatures rarely dropping below 0C (32F).
